Klant stood straight again. Thinking about how he had let down the Maximals=
. They urge to destroy the Alliance gave him more strength. Klant walks out=
side and glances around. He spots Orion behind that wall. Something to figh=
t for. Klant runs up and grabs Orion, then runs back towards the base...
